extensionDescription.message: Generates a QR code to be used by smartphones for easier and faster access without the need of additional accounts, saving your privacy.

defaultTitle.message: Generate QR of the current url
defaultTitle.description: Text that appears on hovering the icon of the extension

popupHeader.description: Message in top of the QR in the popup

popupText.message: Use a QR reader app (like QR Panda) in your smartphone in order to get the link of the current page.
popupText.description: Text shown under the QR code, at the bottom in the popup
